Interrupts.Name: Suprise!
Interrupts.Trigger: The [name] is targeted by an ability, and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: The [name] is revealed and dashes up to 3 spaces. An adjacent foe must then save or take [D]+[fray], or just [fray] damage on a failed save.

Actions.Name: Bone-cracker
Actions.Hit: [D]+1, a number of times equal to the round number.
Actions.Miss: 2 damage, a number of times equal to the round number.
Actions.Effects: The [name] may dash 2 before making this attack. Reveals the [name]. Deals half damage if the [name] is revealed before making this attack.

Actions.Name: Shell Game
Actions.Description: Swap places with a decoy, removing and placing both characters. This does not reveal the [name].

Actions.Name: Scuttling Retreat
Actions.Description: The [name] creates 2 decoys anywhere in range, then secretly replaces any active decoy, swapping places with it.
